R

random - Variable in class ChatBot
used to randomly pick which 'personality' is responding to the clients
random - Variable in class Player_Bot
field to allow a random number generation
remainingTurns - Variable in class GameRPS_GUIcontroller
keeps track of each round and reminds the user how many rounds are left
resultsToShow() - Method in class Game
Class that computes the output displayed to the current GUI implementation of the game.
ruleVisual - Variable in class GameRPS_GUIcontroller
image display container to hold a visual representation of the game rules
ruleWriting - Variable in class GameRPS_GUIcontroller
word display of which moves beat what other moves.
run() - Method in class ChatBotServer.SockServer
This method is what is run while the thread is alive for the client.
runClient() - Method in class ChatBotClient
This method is where the client attempts to connect to the server, and then proceed to find files.
RunClient - Class in <Unnamed>
This class instantiates a ChatBotClient object, and sets the GUI up.
RunClient() - Constructor for class RunClient
 
runServer() - Method in class ChatBotServer
This method uses a couple other methods in this class to set up the server.
RunServer - Class in <Unnamed>
This class helps test the ChatBotServer class and sets up a server.
RunServer() - Constructor for class RunServer
